title: Designation of place for business
context: §445-29 Designation of place for business. Every licensed auctioneer shall file with the treasurer of the county in which the auctioneer is licensed, a statement in writing signed by the auctioneer designating the auctioneer&rsquo;s place for holding auction in the county. Upon any change in location, the auctioneer shall immediately file a new designation. [L 1923, c 177, pt of §1; RL 1925, §1976; RL 1935, §2423; RL 1945, §7025; RL 1955, §155-26; HRS §445-29; gen ch 1985]
